name: Silent Installer
short_description:
Silent installer will make every software unattended installer. it will create a exe or bat file to execute main file.
If you want to make a package then don't worry, silent installer will make it for you. If your main installer file
is exe, msi, air or msp extension added then it will select unattended switch automatically. If your main installer
file is msi then you can uninstall from it just click twice. If any installer file require additional language 
permission then click on language checkbox then try different switch. You can open your main installer 
directory click on File Location button. If any setup file does not support your operating system then
simply hit locate your main installer file and leave blank switching drop-down combo and hit execute.
your file will work.
